::: {#准备 .section .level2}
准备
----

你需要安装以下包来执行代码，完成整个教程。 ggplot2, tidyverse,
colorspace, corrr, cowplot, ggdark, ggforce, ggrepel, ggridges, ggsci,
ggtext, ggthemes, grid, gridExtra, pathwork, rcarocolor, sicco,
showtext, shiny.

交互图表还会用到以下包： charter, echart4r, ggiraph, highcharter, plotly

::: {#cb1 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
# install CRAN packages
# install.packages(c("tidyverse", "colorspace", "corrr",  "cowplot",
#                    "ggdark", "ggforce", "ggrepel", "ggridges", "ggsci",
#                    "ggtext", "ggthemes", "grid", "gridExtra", "patchwork",
#                    "rcartocolor", "scico", "showtext", "shiny",
#                    "plotly", "highcharter", "echarts4r"))

# install from GitHub since not on CRAN
# install.packages(devtools)
# devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/charter")
```
:::
:::

::: {#数据集 .section .level2}
数据集
------

我们在本教程中使用来自空气污染致发病率和死亡率研究(nmaps)的数据。为了使作图易于管理，我们将数据限制在芝加哥1997-2000年间。关于这个数据集的更多细节，请参考Roger
Peng的书《环境流行病学中的统计方法》。

我们可以使用readr包中read\_csv()函数将数据导入到R中。为了以后访问数据，我们使用赋值箭头\<-将数据存储在一个名为chic的变量中。

文中的数据集链接已经失效，评论区下面知友郭晋生提供的链接可以下载得到：

::: {#cb2 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
# chic <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Z3tt/R-Tutorials/master/ggplot2/chicago-nmmaps.csv")
# Load the required library 
library(tidyverse)
```
:::

``` {.sourceCode .r}
# Load our dataset
chic <- read.csv("14_ggplot2cheatsheet-master/chicago-nmmaps.csv", as.is = T)

# Take data only after 1/1/1997
chic$date <- as.Date(chic$date)
chic <- chic[chic$date > as.Date("1996-12-31"),]

# Substring the first four elements [1:4] of the date char so ("1997-01-01") returns "1997"
chic$year <- substring(chic$date, 1,4)
head(chic)
```

ggplot2包

ggplot2是一个基于图形语法的声明式创建图形的系统。你提供数据，告诉ggplot2如何将变量映射到美学（aesthetic），使用什么图形原语，然后它负责处理细节。

ggplot由几个基本元素构成：

    数据：作图用的原始数据
    几何图形 geom_:表示数据的几何形状
    美学 aes(): 几何或者统计对象的美学，比如位置，颜色，大小，形状等
    刻度 scale_(): 数据与美学维度之间的映射，比如图形宽度的数据范围，
    统计转换 stat_: 数据的统计，比如百分位，拟合曲线或者和
    坐标系统 coord_: 数据的转换
    面 facet_: 数据图表的排列
    主题 theme(): 图形的整体视觉默认值，如背景、网格、轴、默认字体、大小和颜色 

::: {#cb9 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```
:::

我们在aes()外部指定数据,即chic，并将映射到美学的数据变量(即date和temp)添加到aes()内部。

::: {#cb10 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g <- ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp))
g
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

当运行时，只会创建一个面板。为什么?这是因为ggplot2不知道我们要如何绘制数据------我们仍然需要提供一个几何图形!

gplot2允许你将当前ggobject赋值给一个变量(在我们的例子中称为g)。稍后你可以通过添加其他层来扩展这个ggobject，要么一次性添加所有层，要么将其赋值给同一个或另一个变量。

有很多很多不同的几何图形(称为geoms，因为每个函数通常都以geom\_开头)，默认情况下可以添加到ggplot中，扩展包甚至提供更多的几何图形。让我们告诉ggplot2我们想使用哪种图形，例如通过添加geom\_point()来创建散点图:

::: {#cb11 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  好了!但这些数据也可以被可视化为线形图(不是最优的，但人们总是这样做)。所以我们只需要添加geom_line()
g + geom_point()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb12 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  好了!但这些数据也可以被可视化为线形图(不是最优的，但人们总是这样做)。所以我们只需要添加geom_line()
g + geom_line()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb13 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  你还可以组合几个几何层——这就是魔法和乐趣的开始!
g + geom_line() + geom_point()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#调整几何图形的属性 .section .level2}
调整几何图形的属性：
--------------------

在geom\_\*命令中，你可以操作视觉美学，如点的颜色、形状和大小。让我们把所有的点转换成大的火红色钻石!

::: {#cb14 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + geom_point(color = "firebrick", shape = "diamond", size = 2)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

注意：你可以使用预设颜色或十六进制颜色代码，甚至可以使用RGB()函数来使用RGB/RGBA颜色。

每个geom都有自己的属性(称为参数)，相同的参数可能导致不同的变化，这取决于你使用的geom。

::: {#cb15 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + geom_point(color = "firebrick", shape = "diamond", size = 2) +
    geom_line(color = "firebrick", linetype = "dotted", size = .3)
```
:::

    ## Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
    ## ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead.
    ## This warning is displayed once every 8 hours.
    ## Call `lifecycle::last_lifecycle_warnings()` to see where this warning was
    ## generated.

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#替换默认的ggplot2主题 .section .level2}
替换默认的ggplot2主题
---------------------

为了进一步说明ggplot的多用途性，让我们通过设置一个不同的内置主题(例如theme\_bw())来摆脱灰色的默认ggplot2外观------通过调用theme\_set()。

::: {#cb17 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
theme_set(theme_bw())

g + geom_point(color = "firebrick")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

我们还将使用theme()函数来定制主题的特定元素。你还可以找到更多关于如何使用内置主题和如何自定义主题的信息。
:::

::: {#调整坐标轴 .section .level2}
调整坐标轴
----------

改变坐标轴的title

让我们给坐标轴加上一些很好的标签。为此我们添加了labs()，为我们想要更改的每个标签提供一个字符串(这里是x和y)。你也可以通过xlab()和ylab()
来改变坐标轴title:

::: {#cb18 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb19 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  xlab("Year") +
  ylab("Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

通常你也可以通过添加符号本身来指定符号(这里是"°")，但下面的代码不仅允许添加符号，还可以添加上标:

::: {#cb20 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = expression(paste("Temperature (", degree ~ F, ")"^"(Hey, why should we use metric units?!)")))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#增加轴和轴标题之间的空间 .section .level2}
增加轴和轴标题之间的空间
------------------------

Theme()是修改特定主题元素(文本、标题、框、符号、背景等)的必要命令。我们将会经常用到它们!
现在我们将修改文本元素。我们可以通过在theme()调用中重写默认的element\_text()来改变所有或特定文本元素的属性(这里是axis标题):

::: {#cb21 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(hjust = 1, size = 15),
        axis.title.y = element_text(hjust = 0, size = 15))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb22 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(vjust = 0, size = 15),
        axis.title.y = element_text(vjust = 2, size = 15))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

vjust指的是垂直对齐，它的范围通常在0和1之间，但你也可以指定该范围之外的值。注意，即使我们水平移动y轴上的轴标题，我们也需要指定vjust(从标签的角度来看，这是正确的)。你也可以通过指定两个文本元素的边距来改变距离:

::: {#cb23 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(margin = margin(t = 5,l = 10), size = 15),
        axis.title.y = element_text(margin = margin(r = 5), size = 15))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#margin对象中的标签t和r分别指代top和right你还可以将这四个边距指定为margint-r-b-l请注意我们现在必须更改右边边距来修改y轴上的空间而不是底部边距 .section .level3}
### margin()对象中的标签t和r分别指代top和right。你还可以将这四个边距指定为margin(t, r, b, l)。请注意，我们现在必须更改右边边距来修改y轴上的空间，而不是底部边距。
:::
:::

::: {#改变轴标题的美学 .section .level2}
改变轴标题的美学
----------------

同样，我们使用theme()函数并修改元素axis.title.x和axis.title.y。例如，在element\_text()中，我们可以覆盖大小、颜色和外观的默认值。

::: {#cb24 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(axis.title = element_text(size = 15, color = "firebrick",
                                  face = "italic"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

face参数可用于使字体加粗或倾斜。

::: {#cb25 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(axis.title.x = element_text(color = "sienna", size = 15),
        axis.title.y = element_text(color = "orangered", size = 15))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#调整坐标轴文本美学 .section .level2}
调整坐标轴文本美学
------------------

类似地，还可以使用axis更改坐标轴文本(这里是数字)的外观。通过文本和/或附属元素axis.text.x和axis.text.y:

::: {#cb26 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(axis.text = element_text(color = "dodgerblue", size = 12),
        axis.text.x = element_text(face = "italic"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#旋转坐标轴文本 .section .level2}
旋转坐标轴文本
--------------

::: {#cb27 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 50, vjust = 1, hjust = 1, size = 12))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#删除坐标轴标题 .section .level2}
删除坐标轴标题
--------------

::: {#cb28 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

我们可以使用theme\_blank()，但是通过labs()(或xlab())中删除标签要更简单。
:::

::: {#限制坐标轴范围 .section .level2}
限制坐标轴范围
--------------

::: {#有时你想要放大到更近距离地查看一些数据你可以在不划分数据的情况下做到这一点 .section .level3}
### 有时你想要放大到更近距离地查看一些数据。你可以在不划分数据的情况下做到这一点:

::: {#cb29 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  ylim(c(0, 50))
```
:::

    ## Warning: Removed 777 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`).

![](data:image/png;base64,)

或者，您可以使用scale\_y\_continuous(limits =
c(0,50))或coord\_cartesian(ylim =
c(0,50))。前者去除范围外的所有数据点，而后者调整可见区域，类似于ylim(c(0,50))。你可能会想:所以最后两者的结果是一样的。但并非如此，有一个重要的区别------比较以下两个图:

::: {#cb31 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,50))
```
:::

    ## Warning: Removed 777 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`).

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb33 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0,50))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#使图表从坐标原点开始 .section .level2}
使图表从坐标原点开始
--------------------

::: {#cb34 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(tidyverse)

chic_high <- dplyr::filter(chic, temp > 25, o3 > 20)

ggplot(chic_high, aes(x = temp, y = o3)) +
  geom_point(color = "darkcyan") +
  labs(x = "Temperature higher than 25°F",
       y = "Ozone higher than 20 ppb") +
  expand_limits(x = 0, y = 0)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#相同比例的坐标轴 .section .level2}
相同比例的坐标轴
----------------

为了演示目的，让我们用一些绘制包含随机噪声的温度值与温度值的关系图。coord\_equal()是一个坐标系统，其指定的比率表示y轴上的单位数与x轴上的单位数相等。默认ratio
= 1，确保x轴上的一个单位与y轴上的一个单位长度相同:

::: {#cb35 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = temp + rnorm(nrow(chic), sd = 20))) +
  geom_point(color = "sienna") +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Temperature (°F) + random noise") +
  xlim(c(0, 100)) + ylim(c(0, 150)) +
  coord_fixed()
```
:::

    ## Warning: Removed 68 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`).

![](data:image/png;base64,)

高于1的比率会使y轴上的单位比x轴上的单位长，反之亦然:

::: {#cb37 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = temp + rnorm(nrow(chic), sd = 20))) +
  geom_point(color = "sienna") +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Temperature (°F) + random noise") +
  xlim(c(0, 100)) + ylim(c(0, 150)) +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 1/2)
```
:::

    ## Warning: Removed 48 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`).

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#使用函数调整标签 .section .level2}
使用函数调整标签
----------------

::: {#有时稍微修改一下标签是很方便的比如添加单位或百分号而不在数据中直接添加这些标签在这种情况下你可以使用一个函数 .section .level3}
### 有时稍微修改一下标签是很方便的，比如添加单位或百分号，而不在数据中直接添加这些标签。在这种情况下你可以使用一个函数:

::: {#cb39 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = NULL) +
  scale_y_continuous(label = function(x) {return(paste(x, "Degrees Fahrenheit"))})
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#调整标题 .section .level2}
调整标题
--------
:::

::: {#添加标题 .section .level2}
添加标题
--------

我们可以通过ggtitle()函数添加标题:

::: {#cb40 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  ggtitle("Temperatures in Chicago")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

或者，你也可以使用labs()函数。在这里你可以添加几个参数，例如副标题，标题和标签(以及如前所示的坐标轴标题)

::: {#cb41 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)",
       title = "Temperatures in Chicago",
       subtitle = "Seasonal pattern of daily temperatures from 1997 to 2001",
       caption = "Data: NMMAPS",
       tag = "Fig. 1")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#加粗标题并在基线上添加空格 .section .level2}
加粗标题，并在基线上添加空格
----------------------------

同样，因为我们想要修改主题的属性，所以我们使用theme()函数，axis.title 和
axis.text来修改字体和边距。以下所有主题元素的修改不仅适用于标题plot.title，还适用于所有其他标签，如plot.subtitle,
plot.caption, plot.caption, legend.title, legend.text,
axis.title和axis.text。

::: {#cb42 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)",
       title = "Temperatures in Chicago") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(face = "bold",
                                  margin = margin(10, 0, 10, 0),
                                  size = 14))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#调整标题位置 .section .level2}
调整标题位置
------------

一般的对齐方式(左、中、右)是由hjust()控制， hjust是horizontal
adjustment的缩写。当然，也可以通过vjust来调整垂直对齐。

::: {#cb43 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = NULL,
       title = "Temperatures in Chicago",
       caption = "Data: NMMAPS") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = .8, size = 16, face = "bold.italic"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#年以来用户可以根据面板区域默认或通过plot.title.position和plot.caption.position指定标题副标题和标题的对齐方式在大多数情况下后者实际上是更好的选择许多人非常喜欢这个新功能因为如果y轴标签非常长对齐后看起来会很糟糕 .section .level3}
### 2019年以来，用户可以根据面板区域(默认)或通过plot.title.position和plot.caption.position指定 标题、副标题和标题的对齐方式。在大多数情况下，后者实际上是更好的选择，许多人非常喜欢这个新功能，因为如果y轴标签非常长，对齐后看起来会很糟糕。

::: {#cb44 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
(g <- ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  scale_y_continuous(label = function(x) {return(paste(x, "Degrees Fahrenheit"))}) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = NULL,
       title = "Temperatures in Chicago between 1997 and 2001 in Degrees Fahrenheit",
       caption = "Data: NMMAPS") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold.italic"),
        plot.caption = element_text(hjust = .5)))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb45 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + theme(plot.title.position = "plot",
          plot.caption.position = "plot")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#标题中使用非传统字体 .section .level2}
标题中使用非传统字体
--------------------

你还可以使用不同的字体，不仅仅是ggplot提供的默认字体(不同的操作系统会有所不同)。有几个软件包可以帮助你使用安装在你电脑上的字体。在
这里，我使用了showtext包，它可以方便地在R图中使用各种类型的字体(TrueType、OpenType、Type
1、web字体等)。在我们加载了包之后，你需要导入必须安装在你电脑上的字体。我经常使用谷歌字体，它可以用font\_add\_google()函数导
入，但你也可以用font\_add()添加其他字体。(注意，即使在使用谷歌字体的情况下，你必须安装字体并重启rstudio
以使用字体)

::: {#cb46 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(showtext)
```
:::

    ## 载入需要的程辑包：sysfonts

    ## 载入需要的程辑包：showtextdb

::: {#cb49 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
font_add_google("Playfair Display", ## name of Google font
                "Playfair")  ## name that will be used in R
font_add_google("Bangers", "Bangers")
```
:::

现在，我们可以使用这些字体家族使用-是的，你猜对了- theme():

::: {#cb50 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)",
       title = "Temperatures in Chicago",
       subtitle = "Daily temperatures in °F from 1997 to 2001") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = .5, size = 25), # family = "Airal"
        plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust = .5, size = 15)) # family = "Playfair" 
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#更改多行文本的间距 .section .level2}
更改多行文本的间距
------------------

::: {#可以使用lineheight参数来更改行与行之间的间距在这个例子中我把线条压在一起lineheight-1 .section .level3}
### 可以使用lineheight参数来更改行与行之间的间距。在这个例子中，我把线条压在一起(lineheight \< 1)。

::: {#cb51 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  ggtitle("Temperatures in Chicago\nfrom 1997 to 2001") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(lineheight = .8, size = 16))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#调整图例 .section .level2}
调整图例
--------

我们将根据季节类别对数据进行颜色编码。或者用更通俗的说法:我们把季节的变化映射到色彩上。ggplot2的一个优点是，当将变量映射到美学时，它会默认添加一个图例。你可以看到，默认情况下，图例标题就是我们在color参数中指定的:

::: {#cb52 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic,
       aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#移除图列 .section .level2}
移除图列
--------

::: {#cb53 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic,
       aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb54 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic,
       aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = F) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#你还可以根据具体情况使用guidescolor-none或scale_color_discreteguide-none虽然theme的更改会一次性删除所有图例但你可以使用后一种选项会删除特定的图例同时保留其他图例例如在这里我们保留形状的图例而放弃颜色的图例 .section .level3}
### 你还可以根据具体情况使用guides(color = "none")或scale\_color\_discrete(guide = "none")。虽然theme()的更改会一次性删除所有图例，但你可以使用后一种选项会删除特定的图例，同时保留其他图例。例如在这里，我们保留形状的图例，而放弃颜色的图例。

::: {#cb55 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic,
       aes(x = date, y = temp,
           color = season, shape = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  guides(color = "none")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#移除图例标题 .section .level2}
移除图例标题
------------

正如你猜到的，使用element\_blank():

::: {#cb56 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#改变图例的位置 .section .level2}
改变图例的位置
--------------

如果你不想把图例放在右边，就用 theme中的legend.position
参数。在theme中作为图例的位置可以是'top', 'bottom', 'left', 'right'。

::: {#cb57 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(legend.position = "top")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#你也可以在面板中指定一个相对的x和y坐标从0左或下到1右或上的向量 .section .level3}
### 你也可以在面板中指定一个相对的x和y坐标从0(左或下)到1(右或上)的向量:

::: {#cb58 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)",
       color = NULL) +
  theme(legend.position = c(.15,.15),
        legend.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent")) #  将图例图层设置在内层
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#改变图例的方向 .section .level2}
改变图例的方向
--------------

图例的方向默认是垂直的，但当你选择"top"或"bottom"位置时，是水平的。但你也可以随心所欲地改变方向:

::: {#cb59 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(legend.position = c(.5, .96),
        legend.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent")) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(direction = "horizontal"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#改变图例的风格 .section .level2}
改变图例的风格
--------------

你可以通过调整theme中的legend.title来改变图例标题的外观:

::: {#cb60 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(legend.title = element_text(
                                    color = "chocolate",
                                    size = 14, face = "bold")) # family = "Playfair"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#改变图例的标题 .section .level2}
改变图例的标题
--------------

::: {#改变图例标题的最简单方法是使用labs层 .section .level3}
### 改变图例标题的最简单方法是使用labs()层:

::: {#cb61 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)",
       color = "Seasons\nindicated\nby colors:") +
  theme(legend.title = element_text(
                                    color = "chocolate",
                                    size = 14, face = "bold")) # family = "Playfair"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#改变图例键值的顺序 .section .level2}
改变图例键值的顺序
------------------

::: {#我们可以通过改变season的不同level来实现 .section .level3}
### 我们可以通过改变season的不同level来实现:

::: {#cb62 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
chic$season <-
  factor(chic$season,
         levels = c("winter", "spring", "summer", "autumn"))

ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#改变图例的标签 .section .level2}
改变图例的标签
--------------

在scale\_color\_discrete()中提供一个名称向量，用月份来替换季节:

::: {#cb63 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  scale_color_discrete(
    name = "Seasons:", 
    labels = c("Mar—May", "Jun—Aug", "Sep—Nov", "Dec—Feb")
  ) +
  theme(legend.title = element_text(
     color = "chocolate", size = 14, face = 2
  )) # family = "Playfair"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#更改图例中的背景 .section .level2}
更改图例中的背景
----------------

为了改变图例键值的背景色(填充)，我们调整theme中legend.key的设置:

::: {#cb64 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(legend.key = element_rect(fill = "darkgoldenrod1"),
        legend.title = element_text(
                                    color = "chocolate",
                                    size = 14, face = 2)) +
  scale_color_discrete("Seasons:") # family = "Playfair"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

如果你想完全去掉它们，可以使用fill = NA或fill = "transparent"。
:::

::: {#改变图例符号的大小 .section .level2}
改变图例符号的大小
------------------

图例中的点在默认大小下可能会丢失一些，特别是没有box的情况下。要覆盖默认图层，可以使用guides图层，如下所示:

::: {#cb65 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(legend.key = element_rect(fill = NA),
        legend.title = element_text(color = "chocolate",
                                    size = 14, face = 2)) +
  scale_color_discrete("Seasons:") +
  guides(color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size = 6)))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#手动添加图例项legend-items .section .level2}
手动添加图例项（legend items）
------------------------------

ggplot2不会自动添加图例，除非你将外观(颜色，大小等)映射到一个变量。但有时候，我想要一个图例，这样就能清楚地知道你在画什么。

这是默认值：

::: {#cb66 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = o3)) +
  geom_line(color = "gray") +
  geom_point(color = "darkorange2") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Ozone")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#我们可以通过将guide映射到变量来强制生成图例我们使用aes映射线和点我们不是映射到数据集中的一个变量而是映射到一个字符串这样我们就得到了每个颜色 .section .level3}
### 我们可以通过将guide映射到变量来强制生成图例。我们使用aes()映射线和点，我们不是映射到数据集中的一个变量，而是映射到一个字符串(这样我们就得到了每个颜色)。

::: {#cb67 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = o3)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = "line")) +
  geom_point(aes(color = "points")) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Ozone") +
  scale_color_discrete("Type:")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

我们已经很接近，但这还不是我们想要的。我们想要灰色和红色!
要更改颜色，我们使用scale\_color\_manual()。此外，我们使用guide()函数重写了图列中的美学。

瞧!现在，我们有一个带有灰线和橙红点的图，以及一个单独的灰线和一个单独的橙红点作为图例符号:

::: {#cb68 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = o3)) +
  geom_line(aes(color = "line")) +
  geom_point(aes(color = "points")) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Ozone") +
  scale_color_manual(name = NULL,
                     guide = "legend",
                     values = c("points" = "darkorange2",
                                "line" = "gray")) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(linetype = c(1, 0),
                                                  shape = c(NA, 16))))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#使用其他图例风格 .section .level2}
使用其他图例风格
----------------

就像您在前面的几个例子中看到的那样，像season这样的分类变量的默认图例是guide\_legend()。如果你将一个连续变量映射到美学，
ggplot2默认将不使用guide\_legend()，而是guide\_colorbar()(或guide\_colourbar()):

::: {#cb69 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic,
       aes(x = date, y = temp, color = temp)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)", color = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#但是通过使用guide_legend你可以强制图例显示离散的颜色就像分类变量的情况一样 .section .level3}
### 但是，通过使用guide\_legend()，你可以强制图例显示离散的颜色，就像分类变量的情况一样:

::: {#cb70 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic,
       aes(x = date, y = temp, color = temp)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)", color = "Temperature (°F)") +
  guides(color = guide_legend())
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb71 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic,
       aes(x = date, y = temp, color = temp)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)", color = "Temperature (°F)") +
  guides(color = guide_colourbar())
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#你也可以用binned-scales .section .level3}
### 你也可以用binned scales：

::: {#cb72 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic,
       aes(x = date, y = temp, color = temp)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)", color = "Temperature (°F)") +
  guides(color = guide_bins())
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#调整背景和网格线 .section .level2}
调整背景和网格线
----------------

有一些方法可以用一个函数来改变图表的整体外观，但是如果你只是想改变一些元素的颜色，你也可以这样做。
:::

::: {#改变面板背景颜色 .section .level2}
改变面板背景颜色
----------------

::: {#要改变面板区域即绘制数据的区域的背景颜色填充需要调主题theme中的panel.background .section .level3}
### 要改变面板区域(即绘制数据的区域)的背景颜色(填充)，需要调主题theme中的panel.background:

::: {#cb73 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "#1D8565", size = 2) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(
    fill = "#64D2AA", color = "#64D2AA", linewidth = 2)
  )
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#改变网格线 .section .level2}
改变网格线
----------

有两种类型的网格线:一级网格线（major grid line）和二级网格线(minor grid
line)。你可以通过覆盖面板的默认值来更改这些。对于每一组网格线，分别使用panel.grid.major和panel.grid.minor。

::: {#cb74 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "gray10", linewidth = .5),
        panel.grid.minor = element_line(color = "gray70", linewidth = .25))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

你甚至可以为所有的网格线指定4个不同水平的设置:

::: {#cb75 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(linewidth = .5, linetype = "dashed"),
        panel.grid.minor = element_line(linewidth = .25, linetype = "dotted"),
        panel.grid.major.x = element_line(color = "red1"),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_line(color = "blue1"),
        panel.grid.minor.x = element_line(color = "red4"),
        panel.grid.minor.y = element_line(color = "blue4"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

当然，如果你愿意，你也可以删除一些或所有网格线:

::: {#cb76 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(panel.grid.minor = element_blank())
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb77 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank())
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#改变网格线的间距 .section .level2}
改变网格线的间距
----------------

::: {#你还可以定义一级网格线和二级网格线之间的断点 .section .level3}
### 你还可以定义一级网格线和二级网格线之间的断点:

::: {#cb78 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 100, 10),
                     minor_breaks = seq(0, 100, 2.5))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#更改图表背景颜色 .section .level2}
更改图表背景颜色
----------------

::: {#同样要改变plot区域的背景颜色填充需要修改主题元素plot.background .section .level3}
### 同样，要改变plot区域的背景颜色(填充)，需要修改主题元素plot.background:

::: {#cb79 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "#1D8565", size = 2) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(
    fill = "#64D2AA", color = "#64D2AA", size = 2)
  )
```
:::

    ## Warning: The `size` argument of `element_rect()` is deprecated as of ggplot2 3.4.0.
    ## ℹ Please use the `linewidth` argument instead.
    ## This warning is displayed once every 8 hours.
    ## Call `lifecycle::last_lifecycle_warnings()` to see where this warning was
    ## generated.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb81 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "gray60",
                                       color = "gray30", size = 2))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#调整边距margin .section .level2}
调整边距（Margin）
------------------

::: {#有时在图片边缘添加一点空间是有用的与前面的例子类似我们可以使用theme函数的参数plot.margin .section .level3}
### 有时，在图片边缘添加一点空间是有用的。与前面的例子类似，我们可以使用theme()函数的参数plot.margin。

现在我们在左边和右边都添加些额外的空间。参数plot.margin可以接受各种不同的单位(c
m、inches等)。你可以为所有边提供相同的值(最简单的是通过rep(x,
4))或为每个边提供特定的距离。我在上面和下面使用1cm的边距，在右边使用3cm的边距，在左边使用8cm的边距。

::: {#cb82 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "yellow"),
        plot.margin = margin(t = 1, r = 3, b = 1, l = 8, unit = "cm"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#做多面板图 .section .level2}
做多面板图
----------

ggplot2包有两个很好的函数，用于创建多面板图形，称为facets。facet\_wrap本质上创建了一个基于单个变量的图形带，而facet\_grid则生成了包含两个变量的网格。
:::

::: {#创建一个基于两个变量的多面版图 .section .level2}
创建一个基于两个变量的多面版图：
--------------------------------

::: {#在有两个变量的情况下由facet_grid完成这项工作变量的顺序决定了行数和列数 .section .level3}
### 在有两个变量的情况下，由facet\_grid完成这项工作。变量的顺序决定了行数和列数。

::: {#cb83 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp))+
   geom_point(color ="orangered", alpha =.3)+
   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle =45, vjust =1, hjust =1))+
   labs(x ="Year", y ="Temperature (°F)")+
   facet_grid(year ~ season)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#创建基于单个变量的多面版图 .section .level2}
创建基于单个变量的多面版图
--------------------------

Facet\_wrap创建单个变量的面版图，前面用波浪线写:Facet\_wrap (\~
variable)。图的呈现可由参数ncol和nrow控制。

::: {#cb84 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g <- 
  ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
    geom_point(color = "chartreuse4", alpha = .3) +
    labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust = 1))

g + facet_wrap(~ year)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#你可以按照自己的喜好来排列这些图比如将它们排成一行 .section .level3}
### 你可以按照自己的喜好来排列这些图，比如将它们排成一行。

::: {#cb85 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + facet_wrap(~ year, nrow = 1)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

甚至调整成一个不对称的网格图：

::: {#cb86 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + facet_wrap(~ year, ncol = 3) + theme(axis.title.x = element_text(hjust = .15))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

允许坐标轴（Axes）自由漫步：

在ggplot2中，多面板图的默认值是在每个面板中使用同样的刻度（scale）。但有时你希望允许一个面板自己的数据来决定scale。通常不这么做，因为它可能会让用户对数据产生错误的印象。但有时它确实很有用，你可以设置scales
= "free":

::: {#cb87 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + facet_wrap(~ year, nrow = 2, scales = "free")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

facet\_wrap（）也可用于2个变量的情况：

::: {#cb88 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + facet_wrap(year ~ season, nrow = 4, scales = "free_x")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

当使用facet\_wrap时，你仍能够控制网格设计:重新定义每行和每列的图形数量，你也可以让所有轴的刻度自由定义。相反，facet\_grid也将接受一个free参数，但只会让它在每列或每行中自由定义，而不是针对每个面板:

::: {#cb89 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + facet_grid(year ~ season, scales ="free_x")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#修改条带文本的风格 .section .level2}
修改条带文本的风格
------------------

通过使用主题，你可以修改条带文本的外观(即每个facet的标题)和条带文本框:

::: {#cb90 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + facet_wrap(~ year, nrow = 1, scales = "free_x") +
  theme(strip.text = element_text(face = "bold", color = "chartreuse4",
                                  hjust = .5, size = 20),
        strip.background = element_rect(fill = "chartreuse3", linetype = "dotted"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

下面两个函数是从Claus Wilke
(ggtext包的作者)的答案中改动而来的，它们允许结合使用ggtext提供的element\_textbox()来突出显示特定的标签（label）。

::: {#cb91 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggtext)
library(rlang)
```
:::

    ## 
    ## 载入程辑包：'rlang'

    ## The following objects are masked from 'package:purrr':
    ## 
    ##     %@%, flatten, flatten_chr, flatten_dbl, flatten_int, flatten_lgl,
    ##     flatten_raw, invoke, splice

::: {#cb94 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
element_textbox_highlight <- function(..., hi.labels = NULL, hi.fill = NULL,
                                      hi.col = NULL, hi.box.col = NULL, hi.family = NULL) {
  structure(
    c(element_textbox(...),
      list(hi.labels = hi.labels, hi.fill = hi.fill, hi.col = hi.col, hi.box.col = hi.box.col, hi.family = hi.family)
    ),
    class = c("element_textbox_highlight", "element_textbox", "element_text", "element")
  )
}

element_grob.element_textbox_highlight <- function(element, label = "", ...) {
  if (label %in% element$hi.labels) {
    element$fill <- element$hi.fill %||% element$fill
    element$colour <- element$hi.col %||% element$colour
    element$box.colour <- element$hi.box.col %||% element$box.colour
    element$family <- element$hi.family %||% element$family
  }
  NextMethod()
}
```
:::

现在你可以使用它修改所有的条带文本:

::: {#cb95 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + facet_wrap(year ~ season, nrow = 4, scales = "free_x") +
  theme(
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_textbox_highlight(
      size = 12, face = "bold",
      fill = "white", box.color = "chartreuse4", color = "chartreuse4",
      halign = .5, linetype = 1, r = unit(5, "pt"), width = unit(1, "npc"),
      padding = margin(5, 0, 3, 0), margin = margin(0, 1, 3, 1),
      hi.labels = c("1997", "1998", "1999", "2000"),
      hi.fill = "chartreuse4", hi.box.col = "black", hi.col = "white"
    )
  ) # family = "Playfair"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb96 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = year, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = season == "Summer"), alpha = .3) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  facet_wrap(~ season, nrow = 1) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("gray40", "firebrick"), guide = "none") +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 1, hjust = 1),
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_textbox_highlight(
      size = 12, face = "bold",
      fill = "white", box.color = "white", color = "gray40",
      halign = .5, linetype = 1, r = unit(0, "pt"), width = unit(1, "npc"),
      padding = margin(2, 0, 1, 0), margin = margin(0, 1, 3, 1),
      hi.labels = "Summer",
      hi.fill = "firebrick", hi.box.col = "firebrick", hi.col = "white"
    ) 
  ) # hi.family = "Bangers"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#创建一个组合图 .section .level2}
创建一个组合图：
----------------

有几种组合图的方法。在我看来，最简单的方法是Thomas Lin
Pedersen的patchwork包

::: {#cb97 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
p1 <- ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp,
                       color = season)) +
        geom_point() +
        geom_rug() +
        labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")

p2 <- ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = o3)) +
        geom_line(color = "gray") +
        geom_point(color = "darkorange2") +
        labs(x = "Year", y = "Ozone")

p1
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb98 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
p2
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb99 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(patchwork)
p1 + p2
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

我们可以通过"/"来改变另个图形的排列：

::: {#cb100 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
p1 / p2
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

而且嵌套图也是可以的：

::: {#cb101 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
(g + p2) / p1
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

或者，Claus Wilke的cowplot包也提供了组合多个图形的功能:

::: {#cb102 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(cowplot)
```
:::

    ## 
    ## 载入程辑包：'cowplot'

    ## The following object is masked from 'package:patchwork':
    ## 
    ##     align_plots

    ## The following object is masked from 'package:lubridate':
    ## 
    ##     stamp

::: {#cb106 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
plot_grid(plot_grid(g, p1), p2, ncol = 1)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

..{gridExtra}包也一样:

::: {#cb107 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(gridExtra)
```
:::

    ## 
    ## 载入程辑包：'gridExtra'

    ## The following object is masked from 'package:dplyr':
    ## 
    ##     combine

::: {#cb110 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
grid.arrange(g, p1, p2,
             layout_matrix = rbind(c(1, 2), c(3, 3)))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

{patchwork}中也有相同的布局思想，它允许创建复杂的组合:

::: {#cb111 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
layout <- "
AABBBB#
AACCDDE
##CCDD#
##CC###
"

p2 + p1 + p1 + g + p2 +
  plot_layout(design = layout)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#调整颜色 .section .level2}
调整颜色
--------

在ggplot2中使用颜色是很简单的。如果你想了解更高级的内容，可以去看看Hadley的书，里面有很好的内容。其他好的资料来源有R
Cookbook和Yan Holtz的R Graph Gallery中的"颜色部分"。

当涉及到{ggplot2}的颜色时，有两个主要的区别。参数color和fill都可以：

1、指定为单色

2、赋值给变量

正如您在本教程的开头所看到的，aes内部的变量是由变量编码的，而那些外部的变量是与变量无关的属性。下面这张图表做了很好的展示:

::: {#cb112 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(year)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = season), color = "grey", size = 1) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Observations", fill = "Season:")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#指定单个颜色 .section .level2}
指定单个颜色
------------

静态、单一的颜色使用起啦很简单。我们可以为geom指定一个单一的颜色:

::: {#cb113 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "steelblue", size = 2) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

如果同时提供了color(轮廓色)和fill(填充色):

::: {#cb114 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(shape = 21, size = 2, stroke = 1,
             color = "#3cc08f", fill = "#c08f3c") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

哥伦比亚大学的Tian Zheng创建了一个有用的R色PDF of R
colors。当然，你也可以指定hex颜色代码、RGB或RGBA值(通过RGB()函数)：
:::

::: {#将颜色赋值给变量 .section .level2}
将颜色赋值给变量
----------------

在ggplot2中，分配给变量的颜色通过scale\_color\_*和scale\_fill\_*函数来修改。为了在数据中使用颜色，最重要的是你需要知道你是在处理一个分类变量还是一个连续变量。调色板的选择应取决于变量的类型，连续变量使用顺序调色板或发散调色板，分类变量使用定性调色板:

::: {#分类变量 .section .level3}
### 分类变量

分类变量是可以分为组(类别)的数据类型。变量可以进一步指定为nominal变量、ordinal变量和binary变量(二分类变量)。定性/分类变量的例子有:

默认的分类调色板是这样的:

::: {#cb115 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
(ga <- ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)", color = NULL))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

你可以选择一组颜色，并通过函数scale\_\*\_manual()将它们分配给一个分类变量(\*可以是color,
colour，或fill)。指定颜色的数量必须与类别的数量相匹配:

::: {#cb116 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ga + scale_color_manual(values = c("dodgerblue4",
                                   "darkolivegreen4",
                                   "darkorchid3",
                                   "goldenrod1"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

ColorBrewer调色板是一个为地图选择配色方案的在线工具。不同的颜色组合被设计成三到十二种外观相似的配色方案。这些调色板作为ggplot2包中的内置函数可用，可以通过调用scale\_\*\_brewer()来应用:

::: {#cb117 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ga + scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

有许多扩展包可以提供额外的调色板。对于R中可用的调色板的广泛概述，请查看Emil
Hvitfeldt提供的集合。你也可以使用他的{paletteer}包，这是R中一个全面的调色板集合，使用一致的语法。

例如，{ggthemes}包允许R用户访问Tableau颜色。Tableau是一个著名的可视化软件，具有知名的调色板。

::: {#cb118 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggthemes)
```
:::

    ## 
    ## 载入程辑包：'ggthemes'

    ## The following object is masked from 'package:cowplot':
    ## 
    ##     theme_map

::: {#cb121 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ga + scale_color_tableau()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb122 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ga + theme_map()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#ggsci包提供科学杂志和科幻主题的调色板想要一个看起来像发表在科学或自然上的颜色的图表吗在这里 .section .level3}
### ggsci包提供科学杂志和科幻主题的调色板。想要一个看起来像发表在《科学》或《自然》上的颜色的图表吗?在这里!

::: {#cb123 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggsci)
g1 <- ga + scale_color_aaas()
g2 <- ga + scale_color_npg()

library(patchwork)
(g1 + g2) * theme(legend.position = "top")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#连续变量 .section .level3}
### 连续变量

连续变量代表一个可测量的量，因此是数值的。定量数据可以进一步分类为连续(可能是浮点数)或离散(仅整数):

在我们的数据集例子中，我们想要着色的变量为ozone，这是一个与温度密切相关的连续变量(更高的温度=更高的臭氧)。函数scale\_*gradient()是一个顺序梯度，而scale*\_gradient2()是发散的。

::: {#cb124 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
gb <- ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = temp)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)", color = "Temperature (°F):")

gb + scale_color_continuous()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

这是发散的默认配色方案:

::: {#cb125 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
mid <- mean(chic$temp)  ## midpoint

gb + scale_color_gradient2(midpoint = mid)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#修改调色板 .section .level2}
修改调色板
----------

自从ggplot2
3.0.0的最新版本发布以来，我们可以在图层被映射到数据之后修改图层外观。那么为什么一开始不使用修改过的颜色呢?由于{ggplot2}只能处理一种color和一种fill的刻度。仔细看看下面的例子，我们在ggdark包中使用了invert\_color():

自从ggplot2
3.0.0的最新版本发布以来，我们可以在图层被映射到数据之后修改图层外观。那么为什么一开始不使用修改过的颜色呢?由于{ggplot2}只能处理一种color和一种fill的刻度。仔细看看下面的例子，我们在ggdark包中使用了invert\_color():

::: {#cb126 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggdark)
library(scico)

ggplot(chic, aes(date, temp, colour = temp)) +
  geom_point(size = 5) +
  geom_point(aes(colour = temp,
                 colour = after_scale(invert_color(colour))),
             size = 2) +
  scale_colour_scico(palette = "hawaii", guide = "none") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

    ## Warning: Duplicated aesthetics after name standardisation: colour

![](data:image/png;base64,)

使用ggdark和colorspace包中的函数，即invert\_color()， lighter ()，
dark()和desature()，更改颜色方案是特别有趣的。你甚至可以组合这些函数。在这里，我们绘制了一个既有参数，颜色和填充的框线图:

::: {#cb128 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(colorspace)

ggplot(chic, aes(date, temp)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(color = season,
                   fill = after_scale(desaturate(lighten(color, .6), .6))),
               size = 1) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2", guide = "none") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#调整主题 .section .level2}
调整主题
--------
:::

::: {#改变整体的作图风格 .section .level2}
改变整体的作图风格
------------------

你可以通过使用主题来改变整个图的外观。ggplot2有八个内置主题:

有几个包提供了额外的主题，有些甚至有不同的默认调色板。例如，Jeffrey
Arnold将ggthemes包和几个定制主题放在一起。无需编写任何代码，您就可以调整几种风格，其中一些以其风格和美学而闻名。

下面是一个使用theme\_economist()和scale\_color\_economist()复制《经济学人》杂志中的绘图风格的例子:

::: {#cb129 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggthemes)

ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  ggtitle("Ups and Downs of Chicago's Daily Temperatures") +
  theme_economist() +
  scale_color_economist(name = NULL)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

另一个例子是Tufte的情节风格，一个基于Edward
Tufte的书《定量信息的视觉展示》的最小墨水主题：

::: {#cb130 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(dplyr)
chic_2000 <- filter(chic, year == 2000)

ggplot(chic_2000, aes(x = temp, y = o3)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone") +
  ggtitle("Temperature and Ozone Levels During the Year 2000 in Chicago") +
  theme_tufte()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

另一个带有现代主题和非默认字体预设的包是Bob
Rudis的hrbrthemes包，它有几个浅色和黑色的主题:

::: {#cb131 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(hrbrthemes)
```
:::

    ## NOTE: Either Arial Narrow or Roboto Condensed fonts are required to use these themes.

    ##       Please use hrbrthemes::import_roboto_condensed() to install Roboto Condensed and

    ##       if Arial Narrow is not on your system, please see https://bit.ly/arialnarrow

::: {#cb135 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = o3)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = dewpoint), show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone") +
  ggtitle("Temperature and Ozone Levels in Chicago")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#改变所有文本元素的字体 .section .level2}
改变所有文本元素的字体
----------------------

::: {#一次性改变所有文本元素的设置非常容易所有的主题都有一个名为base_family的参数 .section .level3}
### 一次性改变所有文本元素的设置非常容易。所有的主题都有一个名为base\_family的参数:

::: {#cb136 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g <- ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "firebrick") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)",
       title = "Temperatures in Chicago")

g + theme_bw() # base_family = "Playfair"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#改变所有文本元素的大小 .section .level2}
改变所有文本元素的大小
----------------------

theme\_*()函数还附带了其他几个base\_*参数。如果你仔细看看默认的主题，你会注意到所有元素的大小都是相对于base\_size的(rel())。因此，如果你想增加图的可读性，你可以简单地改变base\_size:

::: {#cb137 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + theme_bw(base_size = 30) # base_family = "Roboto Condensed"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#改变所有直线和矩形元素的大小 .section .level2}
改变所有直线和矩形元素的大小
----------------------------

::: {#类似地你可以改变line和rect类型的所有元素的大小 .section .level3}
### 类似地，你可以改变line和rect类型的所有元素的大小:

::: {#cb138 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + theme_bw(base_line_size = 1, base_rect_size = 1)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#创建自己的主题 .section .level2}
创建自己的主题
--------------

如果您想要更改整个会话的主题，您可以使用theme\_set(theme\_bw())中的theme\_set。默认值称为
theme\_gray(或theme\_gray)。如果您想创建自己的自定义主题，可以直接从灰色主题提取代码并进行修改。注意rel()函数改变了相对
于base\_size的大小：

::: {#cb139 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
theme_gray
```

现在，让我们修改默认的主题函数，并看看结果:

::: {#cb141 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
theme_custom <- function (base_size = 12) { # base_family = "Arial"
  half_line <- base_size/2
  theme(
    line = element_line(color = "black", size = .5,
                        linetype = 1, lineend = "butt"),
    rect = element_rect(fill = "white", color = "black",
                        size = .5, linetype = 1),
    text = element_text(face = "plain",
                        color = "blue", size = base_size,
                        lineheight = .9, hjust = .5, vjust = .5,
                        angle = 0, margin = margin(), debug = FALSE),
    axis.line = element_blank(),
    axis.line.x = NULL,
    axis.line.y = NULL,
    axis.text = element_text(size = base_size * 1.1, color = "gray30"),
    axis.text.x = element_text(margin = margin(t = .8 * half_line/2),
                               vjust = 1),
    axis.text.x.top = element_text(margin = margin(b = .8 * half_line/2),
                                   vjust = 0),
    axis.text.y = element_text(margin = margin(r = .8 * half_line/2),
                               hjust = 1),
    axis.text.y.right = element_text(margin = margin(l = .8 * half_line/2),
                                     hjust = 0),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "gray30", size = .7),
    axis.ticks.length = unit(half_line / 1.5, "pt"),
    axis.ticks.length.x = NULL,
    axis.ticks.length.x.top = NULL,
    axis.ticks.length.x.bottom = NULL,
    axis.ticks.length.y = NULL,
    axis.ticks.length.y.left = NULL,
    axis.ticks.length.y.right = NULL,
    axis.title.x = element_text(margin = margin(t = half_line),
                                vjust = 1, size = base_size * 1.3,
                                face = "bold"),
    axis.title.x.top = element_text(margin = margin(b = half_line),
                                    vjust = 0),
    axis.title.y = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 1,
                                margin = margin(r = half_line),
                                size = base_size * 1.3, face = "bold"),
    axis.title.y.right = element_text(angle = -90, vjust = 0,
                                      margin = margin(l = half_line)),
    legend.background = element_rect(color = NA),
    legend.spacing = unit(.4, "cm"),
    legend.spacing.x = NULL,
    legend.spacing.y = NULL,
    legend.margin = margin(.2, .2, .2, .2, "cm"),
    legend.key = element_rect(fill = "gray95", color = "white"),
    legend.key.size = unit(1.2, "lines"),
    legend.key.height = NULL,
    legend.key.width = NULL,
    legend.text = element_text(size = rel(.8)),
    legend.text.align = NULL,
    legend.title = element_text(hjust = 0),
    legend.title.align = NULL,
    legend.position = "right",
    legend.direction = NULL,
    legend.justification = "center",
    legend.box = NULL,
    legend.box.margin = margin(0, 0, 0, 0, "cm"),
    legend.box.background = element_blank(),
    legend.box.spacing = unit(.4, "cm"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA),
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "gray30",
                                fill = NA, size = .7),
    panel.grid.major = element_line(color = "gray90", size = 1),
    panel.grid.minor = element_line(color = "gray90", size = .5,
                                    linetype = "dashed"),
    panel.spacing = unit(base_size, "pt"),
    panel.spacing.x = NULL,
    panel.spacing.y = NULL,
    panel.ontop = FALSE,
    strip.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = "gray30"),
    strip.text = element_text(color = "black", size = base_size),
    strip.text.x = element_text(margin = margin(t = half_line,
                                                b = half_line)),
    strip.text.y = element_text(angle = -90,
                                margin = margin(l = half_line,
                                                r = half_line)),
    strip.text.y.left = element_text(angle = 90),
    strip.placement = "inside",
    strip.placement.x = NULL,
    strip.placement.y = NULL,
    strip.switch.pad.grid = unit(0.1, "cm"),
    strip.switch.pad.wrap = unit(0.1, "cm"),
    plot.background = element_rect(color = NA),
    plot.title = element_text(size = base_size * 1.8, hjust = .5,
                              vjust = 1, face = "bold",
                              margin = margin(b = half_line * 1.2)),
    plot.title.position = "panel",
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = base_size * 1.3,
                                 hjust = .5, vjust = 1,
                                 margin = margin(b = half_line * .9)),
    plot.caption = element_text(size = rel(0.9), hjust = 1, vjust = 1,
                                margin = margin(t = half_line * .9)),
    plot.caption.position = "panel",
    plot.tag = element_text(size = rel(1.2), hjust = .5, vjust = .5),
    plot.tag.position = "topleft",
    plot.margin = margin(base_size, base_size, base_size, base_size),
    complete = TRUE
  )
}
```
:::

看修改后的美学与它的面板和网格线的新外观，以及轴刻度，文本和标题:

::: {#cb142 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
theme_set(theme_custom())
```
:::

    ## Warning: The `size` argument of `element_line()` is deprecated as of ggplot2 3.4.0.
    ## ℹ Please use the `linewidth` argument instead.
    ## This warning is displayed once every 8 hours.
    ## Call `lifecycle::last_lifecycle_warnings()` to see where this warning was
    ## generated.

::: {#cb144 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() + labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") + guides(color = FALSE)
```
:::

    ## Warning: The `<scale>` argument of `guides()` cannot be `FALSE`. Use "none" instead as
    ## of ggplot2 3.3.4.
    ## This warning is displayed once every 8 hours.
    ## Call `lifecycle::last_lifecycle_warnings()` to see where this warning was
    ## generated.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

强烈推荐这种改变图表设计的方式！它允许你通过更改一次来快速更改图表中的任何元素。你可以在几秒钟内将所有的结果以一种一致的风格绘制出来，并根据其他需要进行调整(例如，一个更大字体的演示或期刊要求)。
:::

::: {#更新当前主题 .section .level2}
更新当前主题
------------

你也可以使用theme\_update()设置快速更改:

::: {#cb146 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
theme_custom <- theme_update(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "gray60"))

ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() + labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") + guides(color = FALSE)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

\#\#调整线

\#\#在图上添加水平或垂直线

::: {#你可能想要突出一个给定的范围或阈值这可以用geom_hline或geom_vline在定义的坐标上绘制一条线 .section .level3}
### 你可能想要突出一个给定的范围或阈值，这可以用geom\_hline()或geom\_vline()在定义的坐标上绘制一条线:

::: {#cb147 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
theme_custom <- theme_update(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"))

ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = o3)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_hline(yintercept = c(0, 73)) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb148 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g <- ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = dewpoint)) +
  geom_point(color = "dodgerblue", alpha = .5) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Dewpoint")
```
:::

::: {#cb149 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = median(temp)), size = 1.5,
             color = "firebrick", linetype = "dashed") +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = median(dewpoint)), size = 1.5,
             color = "firebrick", linetype = "dashed")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

如果你想添加一条斜率不为0或1的直线，则需要使用geom\_abline()。这是一个例子，如果你想添加一条回归线，使用参数截距和斜率。

::: {#cb150 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
reg <- glm(dewpoint ~ temp, data = chic)

g +
  geom_abline(intercept = coefficients(reg)[1],
              slope = coefficients(reg)[2],
              color = "darkorange2", size = 1.5) +
  labs(title = paste0("y = ", round(coefficients(reg)[2], 2),
                      " * x + ", round(coefficients(reg)[1], 2)))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

稍后，我们将学习如何使用stat\_smooth(method = "lm")命令添加线性拟合
:::
:::

::: {#在图内添加一条线 .section .level2}
在图内添加一条线
----------------

以前的方法总是涵盖了图表面板的全部范围，但有时人们只想突出显示给定的区域或使用线作为注释。在本例中，geom\_linerange()可以提供帮助。

::: {#cb151 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g +
  ## vertical line
  geom_linerange(aes(x = 50, ymin = 20, ymax = 55),
                 color = "steelblue", size = 2) +
  ## horizontal line
  geom_linerange(aes(xmin = -Inf, xmax = 25, y = 0),
                 color = "red", size = 1)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

或者你可以使用geom\_segment()绘制斜率不为0和1的线:

::: {#cb152 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 50, xend = 75,
                   y = 20, yend = 45),
               color = "purple", size = 2) +
  theme_bw()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#在图中添加曲线和箭头 .section .level2}
在图中添加曲线和箭头
--------------------

geom\_curve()添加曲线。直线也可以如果你想的话：

::: {#cb153 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g +
  geom_curve(aes(x = 0, y = 60, xend = 75, yend = 0),
             size = 2, color = "tan") +
  geom_curve(aes(x = 0, y = 60, xend = 75, yend = 0),
             curvature = -0.7, angle = 45,
             color = "darkgoldenrod1", size = 1) +
  geom_curve(aes(x = 0, y = 60, xend = 75, yend = 0),
             curvature = 0, size = 1.5)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

同样的geom也可以用来画箭头:

::: {#cb154 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g +
  geom_curve(aes(x = 0, y = 60, xend = 75, yend = 0),
             size = 2, color = "tan",
             arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.07, "npc"))) +
  geom_curve(aes(x = 5, y = 55, xend = 70, yend = 5),
             curvature = -0.7, angle = 45,
             color = "darkgoldenrod1", size = 1,
             arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.03, "npc"),
                           type = "closed",
                           ends = "both"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#调整文本 .section .level2}
调整文本
--------
:::

::: {#给数据加标签 .section .level2}
给数据加标签
------------

有时，我们想要标记数据。为了避免文本标签的重叠和拥挤，我们只用原始数据的1%，同样代表四个季节。我们使用的是geom\_label()，它有一个label的新aes（）:

::: {#cb155 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
set.seed(2020)

library(dplyr)
sample <- chic %>%
  dplyr::group_by(season) %>%
  dplyr::sample_frac(0.01)

## code without pipes:
## sample <- sample_frac(group_by(chic, season), .01)

ggplot(sample, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_label(aes(label = season), hjust = .5, vjust = -.5) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  xlim(as.Date(c('1997-01-01', '2000-12-31'))) +
  ylim(c(0, 90)) +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

如果你不喜欢标签周围的方框，也可以使用geom\_text()：

::: {#cb156 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(sample, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_text(aes(label = season), fontface = "bold",
            hjust = .5, vjust = -.25) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  xlim(as.Date(c('1997-01-01', '2000-12-31'))) +
  ylim(c(0, 90)) +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

一个很酷的包是ggrepel，它为ggplot2提供了geoms来防止文本重叠。我们只需将geom\_text()替换为geom\_text\_repel()，将geom\_label()替换为geom\_label\_repel():

::: {#cb157 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggrepel)

ggplot(sample, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_label_repel(aes(label = season), fontface = "bold") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

白色填充框可能看起来更好，所以我们将season映射到fill而不是color，并设置一个白色的填充文本:

::: {#cb158 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(sample, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(data = chic, size = .5) +
  geom_point(aes(color = season), size = 1.5) +
  geom_label_repel(aes(label = season, fill = season),
                   color = "white", fontface = "bold",
                   segment.color = "grey30") +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") 
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#添加文本注释 .section .level2}
添加文本注释
------------

::: {#ggplot有几种添加文本注释的方法我们将再次使用geom_text或geom_label .section .level3}
### ggplot有几种添加文本注释的方法。我们将再次使用geom\_text()或geom\_label():

::: {#cb159 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g <-
  ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = dewpoint)) +
  geom_point(alpha = .5) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Dewpoint")

g +
  geom_text(aes(x = 25, y = 60,
                #stat = "unique",
                label = "This is a useful annotation"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

顺便说一下，当然可以改变显示文本的属性:

::: {#cb160 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g +
  geom_text(aes(x = 25, y = 60,
                label = "This is a useful annotation"),
            stat = "unique",
            size = 7, color = "darkcyan") # , family = "Bangers"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

如果你打算用facet函数来可视化数据，可能会遇到麻烦。比如，你可能只希望注释一次:

::: {#cb161 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ann <- data.frame(
  o3 = 30,
  temp = 20,
  season = factor("Summer", levels = levels(chic$season)),
  label = "Here is enough space\nfor some annotations."
)

g <-
  ggplot(chic, aes(x = o3, y = temp)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Ozone", y = "Temperature (°F)")

g +
  geom_text(data = ann, aes(label = label),
            size = 7, fontface = "bold") +
  facet_wrap(~season)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

另一个挑战是多个具有不同刻度的面板图，这可能会切割你的文本:

::: {#cb162 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g +
  geom_text(aes(x = 23, y = 97,
                label = "This is not a useful annotation"),
            size = 5, fontface = "bold") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(NA, 100)) +
  facet_wrap(~season, scales = "free_x")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

一种解决方法是事先计算坐标轴的中点，这里是x轴的中点:

::: {#cb163 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(tidyverse)
(ann <-
  chic %>%
  group_by(season) %>%
  summarize(o3 = min(o3, na.rm = TRUE) +
              (max(o3, na.rm = TRUE) - min(o3, na.rm = TRUE)) / 2))
```
:::

    ## # A tibble: 4 × 2
    ##   season    o3
    ##   <fct>  <dbl>
    ## 1 winter  21.5
    ## 2 spring  31.0
    ## 3 summer  29.2
    ## 4 autumn  23.3

...并使用聚合的数据来指定注释的位置:

::: {#cb165 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g +
  geom_text(data = ann,
            aes(x = o3, y = 97,
                label = "This is a useful annotation"),
            size = 5, fontface = "bold") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(NA, 100)) +
  facet_wrap(~season, scales = "free_x")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

然而，有一种更简单的方法(就修复坐标而言)------但记住代码也需要一段时间。grid包结合ggplot2的
annotation\_custom()允许你根据缩放的坐标指定位置，其中0为low，1为high。grobTree()创建网格图形对象，
textGrob创建文本图形对象。当你有多个不同刻度的图时，这种方法尤其有用。

::: {#cb166 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(grid)
my_grob <- grobTree(textGrob("This text stays in place!",
                             x = .1, y = .9, hjust = 0,
                             gp = gpar(col = "black",
                                       fontsize = 15,
                                       fontface = "bold")))

g +
  annotation_custom(my_grob) +
  facet_wrap(~season, scales = "free_x") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(NA, 100))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#使用markdown和html渲染标注 .section .level2}
使用Markdown和HTML渲染标注
--------------------------

我们再次使用了Claus
Wilke的ggtext包，该包是为改进ggplot2的文本渲染而设计的。ggtext包定义了两个新的主题元素，
element\_markdown()和element\_textbox()。该包还提供了额外的geoms。Geom\_richtext()替代了
geom\_text()和geom\_label()，并将文本渲染为markdown...

::: {#cb167 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggtext)

lab_md <- "This plot shows **temperature** in *°F* versus **ozone level** in *ppm*"

g +
  geom_richtext(aes(x = 35, y = 3, label = lab_md),
                stat = "unique")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

...或html:

::: {#cb168 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
lab_html <- "&#9733; This plot shows <b style='color:red;'>temperature</b> in <i>°F</i> versus <b style='color:blue;'>ozone level</b>in <i>ppm</i> &#9733;"

g +
  geom_richtext(aes(x = 33, y = 3, label = lab_html),
                stat = "unique")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

geom提供了很多可以修改的细节，比如angle(这在默认的geom\_text()和geom\_label()中是不支持的)、框的属性和文本的属性。

::: {#cb169 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g +
  geom_richtext(aes(x = 10, y = 25, label = lab_md),
                stat = "unique", angle = 30,
                color = "white", fill = "steelblue",
                label.color = NA, hjust = 0, vjust = 0
                )# family = "Playfair Display"
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

ggtext包中的另一个geom是geom\_textbox()。这个geom允许动态包装字符串，这对于较长的注释(如信息框和字幕)非常有用。

::: {#cb170 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
lab_long <- "**Lorem ipsum dolor**<br><i style='font-size:8pt;color:red;'>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.<br>Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.</i>"

g +
  geom_textbox(aes(x = 40, y = 10, label = lab_long),
               width = unit(15, "lines"), stat = "unique")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#调整坐标 .section .level2}
调整坐标
--------
:::

::: {#翻转图表 .section .level2}
翻转图表
--------

翻转图表是非常容易的， 使用coord\_flip()。当使用geom
's是用来表示分类数据时，就更有意义了，例如box或如下示例所示的whiskers图:

::: {#cb171 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = season, y = o3)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "indianred") +
  labs(x = "Season", y = "Ozone") +
  coord_flip()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#固定坐标轴 .section .level2}
固定坐标轴
----------

我们可以固定坐标轴的长宽比，并固定x和y轴的呈现物理单位:

::: {#cb172 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = o3)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone Level") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 80, by = 20)) +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 1)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

通过这种方式，不仅可以确保轴上的步长，还可以确保导出的图看起来与预期的一样。然而，如果没有使用合适的宽高比，保存的plot可能包含很多空白:

::: {#cb173 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = o3)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone Level") +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0, 80, by = 20)) +
  coord_fixed(ratio = 1/3) +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "grey80"))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#反转轴180度颠倒 .section .level2}
反转轴（180度颠倒）
-------------------

::: {#你也可以分别使用scale_x_reverse或scale_y_reverse轻松地反转一个轴 .section .level3}
### 你也可以分别使用scale\_x\_reverse()或scale\_y\_reverse()轻松地反转一个轴:

::: {#cb174 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = o3)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  scale_y_reverse()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#转化轴刻度转换 .section .level2}
转化轴（刻度转换）
------------------

::: {#使用scale_y_log10或scale_y_sqrt来转换默认的线性映射例如这里有一个log10转换的轴在这种情况下引入了na所以要小心 .section .level3}
### 使用scale\_y\_log10()或scale\_y\_sqrt()来转换默认的线性映射。例如，这里有一个log10转换的轴(在这种情况下引入了NA，所以要小心):

::: {#cb175 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = o3)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  scale_y_log10(lim = c(0.1, 100))
```
:::

    ## Warning in self$trans$transform(x): 产生了NaNs

    ## Warning: Transformation introduced infinite values in continuous y-axis

    ## Warning: Removed 3 rows containing missing values (`geom_point()`).

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#环化图 .section .level2}
环化图
------

也可以通过调用coord\_polar()将坐标系统环化。

::: {#cb179 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(tidyverse)

chic %>%
  dplyr::group_by(season) %>%
  dplyr::summarize(o3 = median(o3)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = season, y = o3)) +
    geom_col(aes(fill = season), color = NA) +
    labs(x = "", y = "Median Ozone Level") +
    coord_polar() +
    guides(fill = FALSE)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#这个坐标系统也允许绘制饼图 .section .level3}
### 这个坐标系统也允许绘制饼图:

::: {#cb180 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
chic_sum <-
  chic %>%
  dplyr::mutate(o3_avg = median(o3)) %>%
  dplyr::filter(o3 > o3_avg) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(n_all = n()) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(season) %>% # 4个变量
  dplyr::summarize(rel = n() / unique(n_all))

ggplot(chic_sum, aes(x = "", y = rel)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = season), width = 1, color = NA) +
  labs(x = "", y = "Proportion of Days Exceeding\nthe Median Ozone Level") +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1", name = "Season:") +
  theme(axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        panel.grid = element_blank())
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

建议查看相同代码在笛卡尔坐标系下的结果，以理解coord\_polar()和theta背后的逻辑:
标系称为笛卡儿直角坐标系。人们经常把笛卡儿直角坐标系简称为笛卡儿坐标系。空间一点在笛卡儿直角坐标系中的位置分量称为笛卡儿坐标。分子中原子的位置可以用笛卡儿坐标表示。

::: {#cb181 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic_sum, aes(x = "", y = rel)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = season), width = 1, color = NA) +
  labs(x = "", y = "Proportion of Days Exceeding\nthe Median Ozone Level") +
  #coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1", name = "Season:") +
  theme(axis.ticks = element_blank(),
        panel.grid = element_blank())
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#调整图表类型 .section .level2}
调整图表类型
------------
:::

::: {#箱形图的替代方案 .section .level2}
箱形图的替代方案
----------------

箱形图很棒，但也太无聊了。而且，即使你已经习惯了看箱形图，记住，可能有很多人在看你的图时从来没有见过箱形和须状图。

有其他选择，但首先我们要画一个普通的箱形图:

::: {#cb182 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g <-
  ggplot(chic, aes(x = season, y = o3,
                   color = season)) +
    labs(x = "Season", y = "Ozone") +
    scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2", guide = "none")+
  theme_bw()

g + geom_boxplot() 
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

让我们画出原始数据的每个数据点:

::: {#cb183 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + geom_point()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

不仅无聊而且没有信息。为了改善图片，我们可以添加透明度来处理:

::: {#cb184 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + geom_point(alpha = .1)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

然而，在这里设置透明度是困难的，因为要么重叠仍然太高，要么极端值是不可见的。那我们试试别的。

试着给数据添加一点抖动。我喜欢这种可视化，但使用抖动时要小心，因为这是在故意给数据添加噪音，这可能会导致对数据的误解。

::: {#cb185 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + geom_jitter(width = .3, alpha = .5)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

小提琴图是一种有用的可视化方法，它类似于箱形图，只是使用的是核密度来显示拥有最多数据的位置。

::: {#cb186 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + geom_violin(fill = "gray80", size = 1, alpha = .5)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

我们当然可以将估算的密度和原始数据点结合起来:

::: {#cb187 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + geom_violin(fill = "gray80", size = 1, alpha = .5) +
    geom_jitter(alpha = .25, width = .3) +
    coord_flip()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#ggforce包提供了所谓的sina函数其中抖动的宽度是由数据的密度分布控制的这使得抖动在视觉上更吸引人 .section .level3}
### {ggforce}包提供了所谓的sina函数，其中抖动的宽度是由数据的密度分布控制的，这使得抖动在视觉上更吸引人:

::: {#cb188 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggforce)

g + geom_violin(fill = "gray80", size = 1, alpha = .5) +
    geom_sina(alpha = .25) +
    coord_flip()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#为了便于估计分位数我们还可以在小提琴中添加盒子图的盒子来表示25-quartile中位数和75-quartile .section .level3}
### 为了便于估计分位数，我们还可以在小提琴中添加盒子图的盒子来表示25%-quartile、中位数和75%-quartile:

::: {#cb189 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + geom_violin(aes(fill = season), size = 1, alpha = .5) +
    geom_boxplot(outlier.alpha = 0, 
                 coef = 0,
                 color = "gray40", 
                 width = .1) +
    scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Dark2", guide = "none") +
    coord_flip()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#为图创建rug .section .level2}
为图创建Rug
-----------

::: {#rug代表单个数量变量的数据显示为沿轴线的标记在大多数情况下它是在散点图或热图之外使用的以可视化一个或两个变量的总体分布 .section .level3}
### Rug代表单个数量变量的数据，显示为沿轴线的标记。在大多数情况下，它是在散点图或热图之外使用的，以可视化一个或两个变量的总体分布:

::: {#cb190 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp,
                 color = season)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_rug(show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb191 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp, color = season)) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE) +
  geom_rug(sides = "r", alpha = .3, show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#创建相关矩阵 .section .level2}
创建相关矩阵
------------

有几个包可以创建相关矩阵图，有些基于{ggplot2}。下面展示如何在没有扩展包的情况下做到这一点。

第一步是创建相关矩阵。这里使用了{corrr}包，它可以很好地处理管道。我们使用Pearson，因为所有的变量都是正态分布(但如果你的变量是其他分布，可以考虑Spearman)。注意，由于相关矩阵有冗余信息，我们将其一半设置为NA。

::: {#cb192 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(tidyverse)

corm <-
  chic %>%
  select(death, temp, dewpoint, pm10, o3) %>%
  corrr::correlate(diagonal = 1) %>%
  corrr::shave(upper = FALSE)
```
:::

    ## Correlation computed with
    ## • Method: 'pearson'
    ## • Missing treated using: 'pairwise.complete.obs'

::: {#cb194 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  现在，我们使用{tidyr}包中的pivot_longer()函数将生成的矩阵以长格式表示:

corm <- corm %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -term,
    names_to = "colname",
    values_to = "corr"
  ) %>%
  mutate(rowname = fct_inorder(term),
         colname = fct_inorder(colname))

#  作图，使用geom_tile()画heatmap，使用geom_text()添加标签:

ggplot(corm, aes(rowname, fct_rev(colname),
                 fill = corr)) +
  geom_tile() +
  geom_text(aes(label = round(corr, 2))) +
  coord_fixed() +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL)
```
:::

    ## Warning: Removed 10 rows containing missing values (`geom_text()`).

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb196 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
# 这里使用一个发散的调色板，以0相关性为中心，用白色表示缺失的数据。此外，热图周围没有网格线和填充，但有基于底层填充颜色的标签:

ggplot(corm, aes(rowname, fct_rev(colname),
                 fill = corr)) +
  geom_tile() +
  geom_text(aes(
    label = format(round(corr, 2), nsmall = 2),
    color = abs(corr) < .75
  )) +
  coord_fixed(expand = FALSE) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("white", "black"),
                     guide = "none") +
  scale_fill_distiller(
    palette = "PuOr", na.value = "white",
    direction = 1, limits = c(-1, 1)
  ) +
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL) +
  theme(panel.border = element_rect(color = NA, fill = NA),
        legend.position = c(.85, .8))
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#创建等高线图 .section .level2}
创建等高线图
------------

::: {#等高线图可以用来对数据分段显示观测值的密度 .section .level3}
### 等高线图可以用来对数据分段，显示观测值的密度:

::: {#cb197 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(temp, o3)) +
  geom_density_2d() +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", x = "Ozone Level")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb198 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(temp, o3)) +
  geom_density_2d_filled(show.legend = T) +
  coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", x = "Ozone Level")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

现在绘制三维数据，我们将绘制与温度和臭氧水平相关的露点阈值(即空气中的水汽将凝结成液体露珠的温度):

::: {#cb199 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
## interpolate data
library(akima)
fld <- with(chic, interp(x = temp, y = o3, z = dewpoint))

## prepare data in long format
library(reshape2)
```
:::

    ## 
    ## 载入程辑包：'reshape2'

    ## The following object is masked from 'package:tidyr':
    ## 
    ##     smiths

::: {#cb202 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
df <- melt(fld$z, na.rm = TRUE)
names(df) <- c("x", "y", "Dewpoint")

g <- ggplot(data = df, aes(x = x, y = y, z = Dewpoint))  +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone Level",
       color = "Dewpoint")
g
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb203 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g + stat_contour(aes(color = ..level.., fill = Dewpoint))
```
:::

``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  线条表示绘制露点的不同水平，但这不是一个漂亮的图，因为缺少边界，也很难阅读。我们尝试使用绿色调色板来编码每个臭氧水平和温度组合的露点:

g + geom_tile(aes(fill = Dewpoint)) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "inferno")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb208 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  如果我们用一个等高线图和一个瓦片图（tile）来填充等高线下面的区域，会是什么样子?
g + geom_tile(aes(fill = Dewpoint)) +
    stat_contour(color = "white", size = .7, bins = 5) +
    scale_fill_viridis_c()
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#绘制热图 .section .level2}
绘制热图
--------

与我们的第一张等高线地图类似，我们可以通过geom\_hex()很容易地显示分块到六边形网格的点的频数或密度:

::: {#cb209 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(temp, o3)) +
  geom_hex() +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "YlOrRd", direction = 1) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone Level")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb210 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  通常情况下，白线会出现在图中。你可以将颜色映射到count..(默认值)或..density.....

ggplot(chic, aes(temp, o3)) +
  geom_hex(aes(color = ..count..)) +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "YlOrRd", direction = 1) +
  scale_color_distiller(palette = "YlOrRd", direction = 1) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone Level")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb211 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  或为所有六边形单元格设置相同的边框颜色:

ggplot(chic, aes(temp, o3)) +
  geom_hex(color = "grey") +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "YlOrRd", direction = 1) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone Level")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb212 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  也可以修改默认的binning，以增加或者减少六边形单元格cell的数量:

ggplot(chic, aes(temp, o3, fill = ..density..)) +
  geom_hex(bins = 50, color = "grey") +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "YlOrRd", direction = 1) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone Level")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb213 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  如果想要一个常规的网格，可以使用geom_bin2d()，它将数据汇总到基于bin的矩形网格单元格中:
ggplot(chic, aes(temp, o3, fill = ..density..)) +
  geom_bin2d(bins = 50, color = "grey") +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "YlOrRd", direction = 1) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Ozone Level")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#创建岭线图ridge .section .level2}
创建岭线图（Ridge）
-------------------

岭(线)图目前比较流行。虽然可以使用基本的ggplot2命令来创建，但更流行ggridge包，可以更容易创建这些图。我们将在这里使用这个包。

::: {#cb214 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggridges)

ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = factor(year))) +
   geom_density_ridges(fill = "gray90") +
   labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Year")
```
:::

    ## Picking joint bandwidth of 5.23

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb216 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  可以通过分别使用参数rel_min_height和scale指定重叠和尾部。此外，我们根据年份改变颜色，使其更有吸引力。

ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = factor(year), fill = year)) +
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = .8, color = "white",
                      scale = 2.5, rel_min_height = .01) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Year") +
  guides(fill = FALSE) +
  theme_ridges()
```
:::

    ## Picking joint bandwidth of 5.23

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb218 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  还可以将缩放参数设置为小于1的值来消除重叠(但这在某种程度上与岭线图的想法相矛盾……)。下面是一个使用翠绿色渐变和内置主题的例子:

ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = season, fill = ..x..)) +
  geom_density_ridges_gradient(scale = .9, gradient_lwd = .5,
                               color = "black") +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "plasma", name = "") +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Season") +
  theme_ridges(font_family = "Roboto Condensed", grid = FALSE)
```
:::

``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  也可以对每个脊线里的几个组进行比较，并根据不同分组着色。

library(tidyverse)

## only plot extreme season using dplyr from the tidyverse
ggplot(data = filter(chic, season %in% c("Summer", "Winter")),
         aes(x = temp, y = year, fill = paste(year, season))) +
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = .7, rel_min_height = .01,
                      color = "white", from = -5, to = 95) +
  scale_fill_cyclical(breaks = c("1997 Summer", "1997 Winter"),
                      labels = c(`1997 Summer` = "Summer",
                                 `1997 Winter` = "Winter"),
                      values = c("tomato", "dodgerblue"),
                      name = "Season:", guide = "legend") +
  theme_ridges(grid = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Year")
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb225 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  可以在ggridge包中的geom_density_ridge()命令中，使用stat = "binline"为不同的组创建直方图:

ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = factor(year), fill = year)) +
  geom_density_ridges(stat = "binline", bins = 25, scale = .9,
                      draw_baseline = FALSE, show.legend = FALSE) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Season")
```
:::
