::: {#调整条带曲线下区域auc-置信区域ci等 .section .level2}
调整条带（曲线下区域AUC, 置信区域CI等）
---------------------------------------

在这个例子中，我们将使用filter()函数创建一个30天的平均运行时间，这样我们的ribbon就不会有太多噪音。

::: {#cb226 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
chic$o3run <- as.numeric(stats::filter(chic$o3, rep(1/30, 30), sides = 2))

ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = o3run)) +
   geom_line(color = "chocolate", lwd = .8) +
   labs(x = "Year", y = "Ozone")
```
:::

    ## Warning: Removed 29 rows containing missing values (`geom_line()`).

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb228 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  如果我们使用geom_ribbon()函数填充曲线下面的区域会是什么样子?

ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = o3run)) +
   geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = 0, ymax = o3run),
               fill = "orange", alpha = .4) +
   geom_line(color = "chocolate", lwd = .8) +
   labs(x = "Year", y = "Ozone")
```
:::

    ## Warning: Removed 29 rows containing missing values (`geom_line()`).

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb230 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  另外，我们还可以画一条带，在数据上下分别给出一个标准差:

chic$mino3 <- chic$o3run - sd(chic$o3run, na.rm = TRUE)
chic$maxo3 <- chic$o3run + sd(chic$o3run, na.rm = TRUE)

ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = o3run)) +
   geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = mino3, ymax = maxo3), alpha = .5,
               fill = "darkseagreen3", color = "transparent") +
   geom_line(color = "aquamarine4", lwd = .7) +
   labs(x = "Year", y = "Ozone")
```
:::

    ## Warning: Removed 29 rows containing missing values (`geom_line()`).

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#调整平滑线 .section .level2}
调整平滑线
----------

使用ggplot2可以很容易地为数据添加平滑。
:::

::: {#添加loess或gam平滑 .section .level2}
添加LOESS或GAM平滑
------------------

可以简单地使用stat\_smooth()---甚至不需要公式。如果少于1000个点，就添加LOESS平滑，否则就添加一个GAM(广义加性模型，method="GAM")平滑。因为我们有超过1000个点，所以平滑是基于GAM的:

::: {#cb232 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  stat_smooth() +
  geom_point(color = "gray40", alpha = .5)
```
:::

    ## `geom_smooth()` using method = 'gam' and formula = 'y ~ s(x, bs = "cs")'

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb234 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
## `geom_smooth()` using method = 'gam' and formula 'y ~ s(x, bs = "cs")'
```
:::
:::

::: {#添加线性拟合 .section .level2}
添加线性拟合
------------

虽然默认值是LOESS或GAM平滑，但也很容易添加一个标准线性拟合:

::: {#cb235 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = temp, y = death)) +
   labs(x = "Temperature (°F)", y = "Deaths") +
   stat_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE,
               color = "firebrick", size = 1.3) +
   geom_point(color = "gray40", alpha = .5)
```
:::

    ## `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::

::: {#指定平滑公式 .section .level2}
指定平滑公式
------------

::: {#ggplot2允许你指定想要使用的模型也许你想用多项式回归 .section .level3}
### ggplot2允许你指定想要使用的模型。也许你想用多项式回归?

::: {#cb237 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
ggplot(chic, aes(x = o3, y = temp))+
  labs(x = "Ozone Level", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  geom_smooth(
    method = "lm",
    formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3) + I(x^4) + I(x^5),
    color = "black",
    fill = "firebrick"
  ) +
  geom_point(color = "gray40", alpha = .3)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)

::: {#cb238 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  或者假设你想要增加GAM的维度(添加一些额外的平滑摆动):

cols <- c("darkorange2", "firebrick", "dodgerblue3")

ggplot(chic, aes(x = date, y = temp)) +
  geom_point(color = "gray40", alpha = .3) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  stat_smooth(aes(col = "1000"),
              method = "gam",
              formula = y ~ s(x, k = 1000),
              se = FALSE, size = 1.3) +
  stat_smooth(aes(col = "100"),
              method = "gam",
              formula = y ~ s(x, k = 100),
              se = FALSE, size = 1) +
  stat_smooth(aes(col = "10"),
              method = "gam",
              formula = y ~ s(x, k = 10),
              se = FALSE, size = .8) +
  scale_color_manual(name = "k", values = cols)
```
:::

![](data:image/png;base64,)
:::
:::

::: {#做交互图 .section .level2}
做交互图
--------

下面列出了一些库，这些库可以与{ggplot2}组合使用，也可以单独使用在R中做交互图(通常使用现有的JavaScript库)。
:::

::: {#使用plotly和ggplot2 .section .level2}
使用plotly和ggplot2
-------------------

[http://
poly.ly是一个创建在线、交互式图形和web应用程序的工具。plotly包可以让你直接从ggplot2图中创建这些主题，工作流程非常简单，可
以在r中完成。然而，你的一些主题（theme）设置可能会被更改，之后需要手动修改。不太好的是，创建多面版图面（facet）可能不太容易](http://poly.xn--lyweb-2t3dw40rvjaj6aef613ab3biwon8i5ray67ftqctc24hem81db40fk85ex2g7xxb41a.xn--plotlyggplot2,,r-279yda6xp2em4apona86zrct07ggzfqoce5gsa873vygb310guxqbvcntkt35a7jnwl5ggc1dfr0aw1m6l3odspbhz8ds1l.xn--,(theme),-v75njuigq3bb5cy3ak9d96scxf6qae29t53mga592hji8dcz1arp2crqdiri9q6duifh6tj58ff8k.xn--,(facet)-c49lia425ixpfvpl8th1gna11lu4w35pxp7alqa511tgmu3o1dy86gca/){.uri}。

::: {#cb239 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
g <- ggplot(chic, aes(date, temp)) +
  geom_line(color = "grey") +
  geom_point(aes(color = season)) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2", guide = "none") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme_bw()

library(plotly)
```

::: {#ggiraph和ggplot2 .section .level2}
ggiraph和ggplot2
----------------

ggiraph是一个R包，允许你创建动态的ggplot2图形。这允许你向图形添加工具提示、动画和JavaScript动作。当在Shiny应用程序中使用时，该包还允许选择图形元素：

::: {#cb245 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(ggiraph)

g <- ggplot(chic, aes(date, temp)) +
  geom_line(color = "grey") +
  geom_point_interactive(
    aes(color = season, tooltip = season, data_id = season)
  ) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Dark2", guide = "none") +
  labs(x = NULL, y = "Temperature (°F)") +
  theme_bw()

girafe(ggobj = g)
```
:::

::: {#highcharts .section .level2}
Highcharts
----------

Apache
ECharts是一个免费的、功能强大的图表和可视化库，提供了一种简单的方法来构建直观的、交互式的、高度可定制的图表。尽管它是用纯JavaScript编写的，但由于John
Coene，我们可以通过echarts4r库在R中使用：

::: {#cb246 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
library(highcharter)
```
:::

    ## Registered S3 method overwritten by 'quantmod':
    ##   method            from
    ##   as.zoo.data.frame zoo

    ## Highcharts (www.highcharts.com) is a Highsoft software product which is

    ## not free for commercial and Governmental use

::: {#cb250 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
a <- hchart(chic, "scatter", hcaes(x = date, y = temp, group = season))


# 没有找到导出交互性图片的方法
#animation::gganimate(a,"highcharter.gtf")
```
:::
:::

::: {#charter .section .level2}
charter
-------

::: {#cb251 .sourceCode}
``` {.sourceCode .r}
#  charter是John Coene开发的另一个包，它支持在r中使用JavaScript可视化库。这个包允许你在Charts.js框架的帮助下构建交互式图形。

library(echarts4r)

chic %>%
  e_charts(date) %>%
  e_scatter(temp, symbol_size = 7) %>%
  e_visual_map(temp) %>%
  e_y_axis(name = "Temperature (°F)") %>%
  e_legend(FALSE)
```
:::
